#This page tells how to run the engine .
The SASE1.0 can be used by a command-line mode.

= Command =
java edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI Query_File Stream_File Print_Result_Flag

||Query_File|| specifies the location of the query file ||
||Stream_File|| specifies the location of the stream file ||
||Print_Result_Flag|| specifies whether or not to print the details of the result. 1 for print, 0 for not print||

===Example===


java  edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI $SASE_HOME/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize.query $SASE_HOME/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize100.stream 0  


  * [http://code.google.com/p/sase-umass/wiki/04WriteAQuery How to write a query file]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/sase-umass/wiki/03ConfigTheStream How to write a stream file]

= Stream =
==In Class ==
The stream can be configured in the class DebugUI.
